# Optional pinned deps for the ML suite (CPU JAX).
#
# NOTE:
# - These pins must match a Python version that has JAX wheels available.
# - If your Python version differs (e.g. newer CPython), update pins accordingly.
# - Recommended default for CI: Python 3.12.
#
# Install:
#   pip install -r env/python/requirements.txt
#   pip install -r env/python/requirements-ml-jax-cpu.txt

jax==0.4.38
jaxlib==0.4.38
